title: Simulation cloner example crashes on teardown

content.raw:
The example used on [this](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=clone_simulation&cat=physics#Clonethesimulationprogrammatically) tutorial crashes in the end if you follow its instructions:

~~~
$ ./cloner 

Press [ENTER] to clone the current simulation


World cloned. You can connect a client by typing
	GAZEBO_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11346 gzclient

Press [ENTER] to exit and kill all the servers.

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::system_error'
  what():  Invalid argument
Aborted (core dumped)
~~~

This is the whole backtrace:

~~~
Thread 10 "cloner" received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffb025b700 (LWP 4396)]
0x00007ffff5b50428 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:54
54	../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff5b50428 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:54
#1  0x00007ffff5b5202a in __GI_abort () at abort.c:89
#2  0x00007ffff618a84d in __gnu_cxx::__verbose_terminate_handler() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#3  0x00007ffff61886b6 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#4  0x00007ffff6188701 in std::terminate() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#5  0x00007ffff61b3d38 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#6  0x00007ffff7bc16ba in start_thread (arg=0x7fffb025b700) at pthread_create.c:333
#7  0x00007ffff5c2241d in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:109
~~~
content.html:
The example used on this tutorial crashes in the end if you follow its instructions:

$ ./cloner 

Press [ENTER] to clone the current simulation


World cloned. You can connect a client by typing
    GAZEBO_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11346 gzclient

Press [ENTER] to exit and kill all the servers.

terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::system_error'
  what():  Invalid argument
Aborted (core dumped)

This is the whole backtrace:

Thread 10 "cloner" received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffb025b700 (LWP 4396)]
0x00007ffff5b50428 in __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:54
54  ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
